DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate immune response safety primary series schedule include V419 ( PR5I ) 2 6 month age Pediacel 4 month age Primary objectives - To demonstrate mixed schedule induces acceptable response Hepatitis B one month completion mixed schedule - To demonstrate mixed schedule induces acceptable response Hib one month completion mixed schedule Secondary objectives - To describe antibody response PR5I antigens one month completion mixed schedule - To describe antibody response meningococcal serogroup C ( MenC ) conjugate vaccine one month second dose MenC vaccine - To describe safety profile dose study vaccine administer
